he Seven Stone Monks Temple was a monastery in Tu Lung, Kara Tur, established at some point before the early 14 century DR.
The Seven Stone Monks Temple was a well-known monastic organization, already in existence some years before the . The monasterys inhabitants were the seven stone monks who possessed powers of divine nature. One notable creation of the seven monks was Myo-Myos gong, an enchanted shield and a gong wielded by a famous ghost hunter Myo-Myo. The seven stone monks etched the gong with geometric patterns and imbued it with the sacred power to perform holy smite.
